page.title: 17TEXTILE CRAFTS
page.content: At School we do lots of different crafts.From when I started this School I've done lots of sewing.I have done:a cuddly toy,a jewellery box,a mat,a needle case,a skirt and lots of other things.We also do weaving.We have only just got a new weaving loom for the School.Otherwise we do paper weaving.Sometimes we do collages with scrap pieces of material.Once we made knot gardens with rolled up pieces of coloured tissue paper.It was fun.Sometimes we paint and draw a big picture which all the class have done called a 'frieze'.When we are having a jumble sale we make pottery to sell.I have made:a rabbit,a face,a plant pot and a plant pot holder,a mouse and an ordinary pot.We often make pottery for the Easter competition.Some people press flowers and make some nice pictures.
